overview: Yoram Bibring, Chief Financial Officer, joined Fundtech in 2001. Prior to his current position, Mr. Bibring was chief financial officer of ViryaNet, a provider of software solutions to the workforce management market. Prior to joining ViryaNet in April 1999, Mr. Bibring served as chief financial officer of Americash, Inc., a leading operator of e-cash platforms, which was sold to American Express, and prior to that he was at Geotek Communications, a wireless communications service provider where he served initially as chief financial officer and then as the president of its International Division. Mr. Bibring has more than 11 years of experience as a high ranking executive of several technology companies.
